archimate:Requirement.name: SD.2.2.4b: b) threat events common to most development projects that should be defended against (e.g. by leveraging lists such as OWASP Top 10 Web Application Security Risks and SANS/CWE Top 25 Programming Errors)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
